use_case.title: Set Inactive Tab Text Color for Theme

trigger.value: User wishes to set a color for Inactive Tab Text

use_case.basic_path:
1. User begins on Create Theme page (see PSRV-00910:Create a Theme for a Portal)
  2. User locates section of Create Theme form for Inactive Tab Text and either selects one of the preset colors, or enters a custom value.
